circle.style: animation: 1.5s linear 0s 1 normal none running hideMoon; transform: scale(0);
animation: 1.5s linear 0s 1 normal none running revealSun; transform: scale(1);
animation: 1.1s linear 0.4s 1 normal none running revealSun; transform: scale(1);
animation: 1s linear 0.5s 1 normal none running revealSun; transform: scale(1);
animation: 0.9s linear 0.6s 1 normal none running revealSun; transform: scale(1);
animation: 0.8s linear 0.7s 1 normal none running revealSun; transform: scale(1);
animation: 0.7s linear 0.8s 1 normal none running revealSun; transform: scale(1);
animation: 0.6s linear 0.9s 1 normal none running revealSun; transform: scale(1);
